title: Client freezing
body: MY CLIENT FROZE lost me 3 Lp, Then my game froze and my team surrendered losing me 18 and almost into Gold 3 im so upset can i have my Lp back ive benn working my A** off carrrying the people....

replies.body: Are you using Windows 10 that was recently updated?  There was a new update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which is causing freezing issues for some players.  Disabling it should get that fixed up.  Hopefully, that will do the trick so you can get that LP up and get to Gold 3!  Good luck!
glad i found this.  im under a leaver buster right now cause of it.
